resources.string: Please fill in this form to \ncreate an account
Password cannot be less than 8 characters
There is no journal at the moment
Please fill in this form below!

Based on your data, we are %1$d%% confident that your nutritional status is classified as Severely Stunted.

This indicates that your body is not receiving adequate nutrients to support healthy growth and development. But don’t worry—this is a journey, and every step toward better nutrition makes a difference.

To start improving your health, we recommend focusing on a diet rich in high-calorie, protein-packed, and micronutrient-dense foods to support rapid recovery and growth. Foods like lean meats, eggs, dairy, nuts, seeds, whole grains, and leafy greens can help replenish your nutritional reserves.

Here are some recommended foods tailored for you:
- Proteins: Boiled eggs, grilled chicken, lentils, and chickpeas.
- Healthy Fats: Avocados, peanut butter, and mixed nuts.
- Micronutrient-Rich Options: Spinach, broccoli, fortified cereals, and sweet potatoes.

Remember, small but consistent changes can lead to big improvements in your health. Keep striving!

Based on your data, we are %1$d%% confident that your nutritional status is classified as Stunted.

This suggests that you may be lacking some essential nutrients required for optimal growth. The good news is that with a balanced and nutrient-rich diet, you can catch up and achieve better health outcomes.

We recommend incorporating a diet that emphasizes growth-promoting nutrients, including a healthy balance of carbohydrates, proteins, fats, and essential vitamins and minerals. Focus on whole, unprocessed foods that provide sustained energy and nourishment.

Here are some recommended foods tailored for you:
- Proteins: Fish, tofu, yogurt, and beans.
- Carbohydrates: Brown rice, oats, whole-wheat bread, and quinoa.
- Vegetables: Carrots, bell peppers, and green beans.
- Snacks: Dried fruits, nuts, and low-sugar smoothies.

Every meal is an opportunity to nourish your body. Let’s take this step together!

Based on your data, we are %1$d%% confident that your nutritional status is classified as Normal.

Great job! Your nutrition is supporting your growth and maintaining your health. However, there’s always room to fine-tune your diet for optimal performance and resilience.

We suggest focusing on a maintenance-focused diet that sustains your energy levels and supports your body's natural growth and functions. A diverse diet with moderate portions and all essential nutrients will help you stay on track.

Here are some recommended foods tailored for you:
- Proteins: Grilled turkey, eggs, lentil soup, and cottage cheese.
- Carbohydrates: Sweet potatoes, whole-grain pasta, and barley.
- Vegetables: Broccoli, spinach, and zucchini.
- Fruits: Apples, bananas, and berries.

Keep up the great work and continue making healthy food choices!

Based on your data, we are %1$d%% confident that your nutritional status is classified as High.

Congratulations on maintaining a healthy and balanced diet! Your current nutrition is supporting your growth and overall well-being. To continue thriving, we encourage you to maintain a diet rich in energy-dense and nutrient-dense foods to fuel your active lifestyle.

Here are some recommended foods tailored for you:
- Proteins: Salmon, eggs, lean beef, and chickpea salads.
- Healthy Fats: Olive oil, avocado toast, and nuts.
- Carbohydrates: Quinoa, whole-grain bread, and roasted potatoes.
- Fruits and Vegetables: Mangoes, oranges, kale, and asparagus.

Your commitment to good nutrition is inspiring, keep it up and continue enjoying a variety of wholesome foods!
